author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two sandalwood trees that were being grown in a children’s home were cut down and stolen by unidentified persons on Tuesday night in Tiruvannamalai district.

There are only a few sandalwood trees in the Pushpam Children Home, located in the Perumbakkam Road here.

The trees that were cut had a girth of about 12 cm.
title: Two sandalwood trees cut down, stolen
